REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0523 reute b f BC-/SEARS-<S>-FEBRUARY-S 03-05 0051

TEXT.TITLE: SEARS <S> FEBRUARY SALES UP 4.9 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Sears, Roebuck and Co said revenues of its Merchandise Group in February rose 4.9 pct to 1.85 billion dlrs from 1.76 billion dlrs a year ago. It said domestic sales were led by better than average increases in apparel, home fashions and hardware. Reuter
